meanings.definition: A small amount of a soft or semi-liquid substance
meanings.sent1: She added a dolloped of cream to her coffee.
meanings.sent2: The chef placed a dolloped of sauce on the dish.
meanings.sent3: The dolloped of honey on the toast made it extra sweet.
meanings.sent4: The dolloped of paint on the canvas transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The dolloped of butter on the warm bread melted deliciously.

meanings.definition: To add a small amount of a soft or semi-liquid substance to something
meanings.sent1: He dolloped ketchup on his fries.
meanings.sent2: She dolloped whipped cream on the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The child dolloped glue on the paper for the art project.
meanings.sent4: The baker dolloped frosting on the cupcakes with precision.
meanings.sent5: The gardener dolloped fertilizer on the plants to help them grow.
